website_summaries.verdict: Easy setup. Locking wheels make for stability and mobility at the same time. Hard to go wrong with this product.
pros: Patented corner ball holders make it much easier to keep track of lost balls
cons: Occasional problems with the scoring mechanism that comes with the table

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and craftsmanship for a great price
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews for all brands of tables. We decided to choose this one based on product descriptions, features, and reviews. We are very satisfied with our choice and play every day. The table was delivered earlier than scheduled which made us happy. The table is very easy to set up and came with great instructions; easy to read and follow. The craftsmanship is awesome. The table is easy to level and maneuver with a good solid playing surface and nice painted lines. The ball holders on all four corners are extremely convenient. I love the volume of the ping as the ball strikes the table.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mazzuca

customer_reviews.title: Good but... (With Update)
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today and have played about 6 games. Everything works well except possibly the bounce. It could be the balls, b ut I suspect it was because we were playing on a hardwood table, which had excellent bounce, and this one, which has little bounce. Perhaps this is unfair to compare. I'll updated after I've gotten used to it. UPDATE: Now that I have had it for a few days and played on it more, I've gotten used to the bounce. It is otherwise well made, very easy to assemble and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice regulation-size table
customer_reviews.text: The origins of Joola are a bit complicated, a German brand bought by a Maryland office representing a Chinese manufacturer, but the table itself is made in China. The quality is solid, and the weight is heavy! This is at the very least a two-person lift per half. The table does not connect in the middle, but is two separate halves clamped together by the net clamp. It is very solid and rigid, without much assembly required beyond attaching the wheels. Table includes magnetically attached score keeping sliders, and the corners function as ball storage. Table comes with a small cute welcome package. Our purchase was made through Amazon Warehouse, and the quality is essentially factory new.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the entire family!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this for my husband. He had his first tournament and a great time was had by all. We will be using this most every weekend. It seems to be pretty durable, but only time will tell. The little ball holders are a bit cheaply made. The plastic busted as we were trying to “snap” them in place. You also reinforce them with screws. A couple of those were stripped almost immediately, so if the ball holders are the determining factor between this model and the one below, buy a basket as a ping-pong ball holder and save yourself some money. As far as putting it together, it was pretty simple. Took about 30 minutes. We would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MLG

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to move around and to store
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived on time, as promised. It was fairly straight forward to install and it took around 1 hour to put together although it was my first time that I put a ping pong table together and I did it in two separate sessions. Mounting the ball holders was not obvious in that the screws did not seem to fasten into the table at first. Also, I have not installed the Abacus scorers yet. It is very easy to move around and to store. So far (1 month of use), we are very happy with its performance!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel I.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged table corners when unpacked
customer_reviews.text: Lack of Joolo's QC and quality product and or packing. Although exterior corners were dented, where I did not see large holes I signed for it. The interior packing showed signs of abuse and when we opened the table, one under bracket near release was completely torn off table, screws and all. There are two corners of the table seriously damaged. Unacceptable! I read many reviews that also mentioned damage, I wish I had listened and purchased the table elsewhere. Shame on Amazon for continuing to support manufacturers like this. I took a day off of work, it weighs 200 lbs, arranged for help to find this!. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: US Quality

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service...non existent in fact!
customer_reviews.text: I previously rated this table very high; however, it did arrive missing a part. I have followed the instructions to a T to have the very small, and simplistic piece replaced; including 3 emails and 2 phone calls. Not a single response. Very disappointing that such a nice table could be have such LOUSY service associated with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M Routhieaux

customer_reviews.title: Awesome solid table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table!! I absolutely love it. One negative is that it came with a small home in the net. Not a deal breaker, but that is why I took off 1 star. Will try to call customer service to replace that piece but from reading eearlier reviews - hope it will not be a difficult task :) Overall Im very pleased though! It is sturdy, solid, very well made!
customer_reviews.author: devchenka

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quality of materials
customer_reviews.text: Great design and quality of materials. If customer service was better than non-existent (no response to several calls and emails seeking help on surface repair to damage we caused), assembly not quite so sloppy (components not fastened to table "squarely", and packaging using reasonably light materials (very, very heavy and difficult to dispose of cardboard glued to hardboard) I would have given it "5".
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great Ping Pong Table
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact professional ping pong table I was looking for. Easy to assemble! It does require two people to move the box, it is heavy. Took me about an hour to assemble. Some of the great things I like about this 1.) Easy of assembly 2.) Two separate halves for solo play, 3.) High Quality and JOOLA does not disappoint. 4.) Get the delivery option thru Amazon, the delivery team was very professional and friendly. I really like how easy it is to put the net on, and the abacus MAGNETIC scoring racks.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Beware shipping
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the table is great, but I wouldn't know because I'm spending time repairing the screw holes. Easier to repair than to return considering how heavy the table is. Beware of shipping. The box looked dirty, but fine; however, this does not mean the shipper didn't drop it flat such that the box didn't look damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with hardware
customer_reviews.text: This table is not a cheap ping pong table. Yet after less than 30 days of usage, one of the under brackets totally pulled away from the underside of the table and the screws were ripped out. Now I have 4 holes in my table and have not had an answer back yet on what they might do on reparations.
customer_reviews.author: JKL

customer_reviews.title: Good table but somebody got to take the blame off binding leg
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking table and easy to put together but one of the Leg is binding because of one of the plate came screwed in crooked. It would be a pain to repack and send it back, i’m gonna press my luck and hold onto it .
customer_reviews.author: Mattv

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: We sold our pool table with the table top conversion kit because we didn't like the added height the pool table gave the table tennis table. We ordered this to replace it and what a difference! We also love that we can flip it up and move it to give us some extra space when we need it. Legs and wheels are super sturdy and we love how easy it is to set up the net. I'm glad we spent a little extra and got a solid table instead of one of the cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: This is the table you have been waiting for!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been asking for a table tennis table for a long time and we recently purchased the JOOLA Rally TL and let's just say that there hasn't been a night without mini family tournaments since. We had it delivered to the room through Amazon shipping and setup took 20 minutes including unboxing and cleanup. The table is easy to move into single-serve play, and back into regular play in just seconds. It's sturdy, smooth, and loads of fun. The ball storage on the corners is a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: A. Singer

customer_reviews.title: JOOLA Rally TL 300 rocks it!
customer_reviews.text: I researched the 5 top ping pong tables and this one came up second. However, it was definitely first in my book due to the competitive price and quality. I was looking for a good quality table for a reasonable price; one that would hold up and both kids and adults can enjoy. This has accomplished that. It arrived in good condition and was very well packaged. I saw some reviews that mentioned difficulty of set up, but I found it relatively easy and quick. I was a bit surprised it was in two sections, but they fit together nicely. Doesn't come with paddles and balls, however, Luckily we already had a set.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S Neyland

customer_reviews.title: Quality Table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built and high quality Table Tennis table. The frame is steady and the surface is smooth. The assembly is fairly easy. I like the fact that it came in two separate pieces so it can be easily moved into position without having to hire movers. I only needed to attached the wheels and it was ready for action. The table can be easily separately and folded for storage, or for one person to practice with one side folded up. I also like the color Black, it provides a nice contrast with the white or yellow ball as it bounces around, especially when my floor color is yellow and orangoish,
customer_reviews.author: N. T

customer_reviews.title: High quality table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble despite very unhelpful “instructions”. Folding is pretty simple but is not always smooth, same goes for maneuverability. Overall I would recommend but don’t have another comparable one to judge the ratings. The playing surface is excellent, the ball holders are a nice touch. The scoring abacus is nice in theory but have not really used it.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Santa gift for my four kids for Christmas! Easy to assembly in under 30 min. and we DID NOT PAY extra for Amazon assembly. Table seems really good quality. My kids love being able to play ping pong by themselves by putting up the one side. A fun family gift for sure (my kids are ages 7-13). Adults love it too. Nice to have something non electronic to entertain my kids and their friends when they come over. Only downfall as my daughter scratched on the second day trying to put up the one side by herself. We used a black sharpie to cover the scratch an you can barely see it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons (11 and 14] LOVE this ping pong table. Actually the whole family (Mom and Dad included) have used and enjoyed this gift ever since it arrived. A big hit! I chose the option to have the table placed in the room of their choice which apparently was worth the extra fee as my daughter-in-law said that it was so heavy that two men had a hard time getting into the basement. If you’re looking for this type of thing it seems that this brand is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table but heavy (due to sturdiness) and awkward to move down stairs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product very sturdy which is what I really wanted for our grandchildren (preteen) who I expect to land on it at some point.. Only problem was getting it into the basement due to weight and size. I broke down the contents of the box but it still took 3 of us to get the two sides down the stairs. I couldn’t get delivery downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: rickster

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: The Joola Ping Pong table is a very nice sturdy table . I would give it five stars but it was missing a couple parts (Ball Holder Bottom and Ball Holder screws). I called customer service but was informed (message) due to high call volume I would get a quicker response if I went online and filled out the online contact. I did fill out the online customer service contact form and it has been over two weeks and I have not received any response. While the missing parts are not needed for play, it was a reason I went with the table so I am disappointed I have not been contacted or sent the missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Get The Best, You Will Be Glad You Did
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived on time, undamaged. Assembly was quick and simple. The table is perfect, mobile and storage a breeze. We love it. The whole family enjoys how perfect it fits our lifestyle. This is a quality table and a good value. Especially enjoy the ball storage and always net that is always tight. Grandson loves playing by himself when others are busy. Also this two-piece table is much easier for leveling than a four-piece table. You won't regret spending the extra. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: John Craighill

customer_reviews.title: Proud owner of a Joola!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! The assembly was simple to put together and was up in 20 minutes. The wheels roll smooth and easy to move around my garage. It's easy to put upright into storage position - even my 6 year old can do it. It plays true and every part of the table is precise! It's an indoor table but I keep it in my garage for those that are curious on purchasing indoor vs. outdoor. I just wouldn't leave it outdoors. Even though I bought for myself, my 6 year old is already turning into a little pro. Thanks again Joola!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Table in this Price Range
customer_reviews.text: Really solid Ping Pong table with a nice top and smooth finish. The packaging was really robust, table came in pristine condition. The assembly is MUCH easier than most other tables, all you have to do is bolt on the 4 legs. It's heavy which is a good thing, and the ball holders on the corners are holding up well and actually working. This made for a great Christmas surprise for the family!
customer_reviews.author: R. Price

customer_reviews.title: Great Table (First Time Purchasing a Table)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table so far. It took a less than an hour to put together and is easy to move around and set up, even with one person. Only issue we had was with delivery. It was supposed to be delivered inside our house, but the young man who delivered the table was alone and the best he could manage was to get it in our garage. It wasn't a huge issue, but did delay set up a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Table
customer_reviews.text: The table looked nice when we took it out of the box, but unfortunately it was dented in various sections. Amazon was able to send another table but AGAIN this one was also damaged. We did not want to have to go through the trouble of having to send it back again, however we were not even able to assemble the table due to the defect. Wish there was an alternative but per Amazon's policy, we cannot order the table after receiving two damaged products.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, but a mighty OUT-GASSER!
customer_reviews.text: What an awful smell and I imaging unhealthy out-gaser! Even after a week. I suggest you buy it a month before you need it and let it out-gas in a storage shed you don't have to enter. I do not know for sure that it will ever be odor-free. REALLY UNPLEASANT for now.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much as expected
customer_reviews.text: The table was as advertised. Sturdy construction, relatively easy to assemble and move. Convenient little ball holders on the corners. The table essentially stays as two parts at all times, with the net clamps holding it together. Makes it easier to store and move, but a little unexpected. Definite recommendation if you're buying a table to use a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This table was so easy to set up, my hubby did it without my help!! It is good quality, we like the way the net attaches to the table, we had another table before where it was flimsy and warped, this one is solid. Our kids have played on this every single day since Christmas, and it doesn't look like losing it's appeal anytime soon. We got it when it was on sale, and are really happy with the value for the price we paid. LOVE THIS TABLE!
customer_reviews.author: corinne317

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic solid table.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic solid table. Setup was easy. 30 minutes, two people (to lay the table down and lift it up again). Two halves which do not connect but are placed adjacent to each other for play. Easy to fold up to push out of the way if some space is needed. The ball holders on each corner are a really nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Collier

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic, high-quality table - even easier to set up than the instructions say!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent, and the assembly was very quick. Since the table splits into two parts and stands vertically on casters (intended for space-conscious storage), we apply some static cling dry-erase sheets (Quartet Anywhere Dry Erase Sheets) and use them as whiteboards for education and home office as well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles LaHeist

customer_reviews.title: Great Surface - Delivery and Assembly Headaches
customer_reviews.text: First, like many reviews here, the playing surface for this table is excellent. My delivery and assembly experience was awful. First, a metal indoor/outdoor table was delivered. Not only was it the wrong table but it was also damaged/bent. The replace table had one part that was not the correct size and I had to manufacture a piece to properly attach all four wheels. Once I got the correct table assembled the performance is excellent. As others have noted the scoring mechanism is kindy cheesy. If you can get this table without having it shipped I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Dreas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my family for Christmas and have experienced a lot of joy with it. It is a beautiful table and we got a great price. I like the fact that it can be easily stored or made so that one person can practice. We are completely satisfied with this table and are glad we went with Joola!
customer_reviews.author: tset

customer_reviews.title: Quality Table
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged Assembly was simple Individual tables makes moving it around easy Great quality, table surface is nice and flat and the hardware is sturdy We purchased for Christmas and have been enjoying it ever since. It is in a common play area, so we frequently take it down and put it back up. Really glad we went with this table, moving 2 halves is far less work than a heavier single unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged. Super easy to assemble, and was up and playing in no time. Very good quality and so much fun, my wife and I play most nights after dinner. Our neighbors have even stopped over for a game or two, just by being out and about while we were playing and seeing how much fun we were having. It's easy to move when needed, on wheels but they lock so no moving when paying. It's sturdy enough for the occasional lunge into it for the ball. A great time every time we play!
customer_reviews.author: CPowers

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, quality, and the features!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking table with features such as fold back option and the corner ball holders. Fairly straightforward installation, pretty much did it myself with some help from my spouse in lifting it. It weighs a lot, but that speaks of the table's sturdy construction/quality. Super excited. All my friends loved the table and they can't stop admiring the color of the table.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: we love this table
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this ping pong table in January, we love this table. Amazon delivered this ping pong table right to our door, the special delivery man explained how to unpack and assemble. This is the best ping pong table we have ever used. The quality is so good, it is simply the best.... I have told all of my friends about this, and my sister bought one after I told her how great it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, high quality table!
customer_reviews.text: No damage whatsoever from the shipping. Very high quality and very easy for one person to fold each side after assembly. I gave four stars for assembly just because it’s heavy an an awkward/large size but my 66 year old mother and I did it together. I recommend laying a thick comforter down to set each side face down on to avoid scratching during assembly. My 12 year old can turn one side up by himself to play solo and he loves it! We are more than pleased with this table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made table.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to assemble. My first table came and the corners were damaged while shipping. I called and they sent a new one in two days. Awesome customer service. The table was really easy to put together. It feels like it’s made well and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: great! so much fun. love the corner pockets
customer_reviews.text: my only complaint is i bought mine used/open box and the underneath screws have fallen out in a few places. beyond that(which i can fix), this is a high quality table and my friends and i have been loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: Bait & Switch
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I was looking forward to playing on the "Professional MDF Indoor" model as was displayed in the description. What I received was a cheap, outdoor version which is well below the price I paid. Save your time and money and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: David Newman

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time. My husband is pretty handy and it took him less than 30 minutes from opening the box to playing a family doubles tournament. One of the corners for the ball holders arrived with a small crack in it but it still functions. The two independent halves make it very easy to move around. Once you get the table set in place with the casters locked, the table hasn’t moved. Super easy set up and adjusting. We hope it holds up for years of play.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Kenoyer

customer_reviews.title: A high quality table
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this product. Assembly was straight-forward; the shipping package is very heavy so make sure it is delivered close to assembly. It is well built and sturdy; castors are heavy duty and can all be locked. The table folds into 2 sections, each of which can be wheeled separately. The net is perfect and good quality. Compared to many cheaper tables we looked at the quality in this table is definitely worth the extra cost. The black color is great. We have used it for 9 months and it still looks like new. Strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Clara D

customer_reviews.title: Quality table that was quick and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table as a family Christmas gift. It was well packaged and easy to put together, requiring only a Phillips screwdriver, a 1/2” and 9/16” wrench. Including unboxing it took about 20 minutes to assemble. It is quick and easy to fold up and store the table when not in use. The table is built well and I expect it to provide us years of use. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a quality table at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H

customer_reviews.title: Almost Great
customer_reviews.text: The table is high quality. It goes together easily for two people. My only complaint is that it came with a large dent on one end. I reported this to the seller but have heard nothing back from them. They informed me in advance the box would be damaged but that there would be no cosmetic damage.
customer_reviews.author: REDJr

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Being a novice table tennis table owner, I was very happy with the ease of assembly of this table. It folds up very easily, and since it is actually two pieces I can nest them together a little more tightly and have them take up a little less room than I was expecting. The only improvement I could ask for is some type of built in storage (possibly on the branded cross bar between the legs) to store paddles and balls when not in use. I do not count this as a con, as this table performs exactly as advertised. If, for some reason, I ever buy another table tennis table, I will purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Reta Britton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality in a Table
customer_reviews.text: Kids wanted a ping pong table for Christmas, so started doing the required research and came across the Rally TL 300 from Joola. You can certainly spend more for a table, but why would you? This one is excellent - crazy heavy, but the kind of solid that you know will last a long time. The fact that you can split the table to use as two independent serving or eating tables makes it all the more useful to have around the house. The corner ball holders are a great feature - wouldn't have normally bought for that but we love them. Would highly recommend for anyone who wants a casual fun table but who is also looking for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this table. It looks great and was easy to assemble. It plays well and we have used it a lot since getting it set up a couple weeks ago. The only complaint is it was missing one of the corner ball holders, but we are getting by fine with just 3 out of 4. We bought it on sale, and found the price dropped another $50 after our purchase. It would have cost $50 to repurchase and send back the original so that was too bad. We don't regret the purchase at all, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Nield

customer_reviews.title: Quality table for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This table arrived and the truck driver pointed out there was a couple spots where the cardboard was torn. When I opened it I saw that extra measure were in the packaging to prevent damage. There was wood lining every side of the table. Came out in perfect condition and assembled easily. Seems to be very sturdy and good quality. Price was right. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It arrived but had some issue with delivery people. Needs two people to assemble and carry to position. Seems like there could be a better way to hold the pieces together other than two big clips for $400 and the surface marks a bit easily but overall we enjoy it and have lots of fun playing.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but.....
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy table EXCEPT several of the screws have come out on one end and won't screw back in so we are left with having to try to fix it with glue or new screws. Returning for a replacement would be an option but dont have any of the packing materials. It broke in the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Beason

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Not There
customer_reviews.text: This table, while easy to put together, is not well made. Please be careful when folding the table and do not let your children do it. My wife had a painful experience when the bracket broke off and the table came down on her shin (see pictures). Wish I could return this table but we have already had it a little over a month. I would definitely pay more for better quality next time.
customer_reviews.author: Pool Maintenance

customer_reviews.title: The best tennis table
customer_reviews.text: This tennis table is of excellent quality, easy to fold and unfold and to store. One person can easily move it from place to place. Arrived in 2 weeks after promising 2 days, but this was carrier's problem (we believe because of the heavy box weight). It was difficult to assemble. Enclosed assemble guide was not a perfect one (unfortunately). However, when that hard part was done we have never regret of buying this table and enjoy playing table tennis at home.
customer_reviews.author: OM

customer_reviews.title: Great ping pong table!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and design! I like the ball holders in the corners and magnetic abicus' for score keeping. Folding the halves is easy to do as well. The assembly wasn't too bad once I figured out what tools were required (Phillips head screwdriver, rachet, and wrench). I'm not sure about 15 mins, but certainly about 30 with all tools available and doing it alone.
customer_reviews.author: George Parson

customer_reviews.title: Overall this great table and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall this great table and worth the money! If you’re on the fence, go with it - it will not disappoint. Was a little nervous the table would arrive damaged through delivery, however was well packaged and in perfect condition when fully set up. I would recommend having two people for setup only because of how heavy this table is - it just made things a lot easier. Also allow for a little extra space for storage because the two pieces nest with one another therefore is actually 65” wide when stored vs 60”. This may not be a big deal to most but if you’re planning on storing in tight space something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My overall impression is this table is built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: Set up took about 30 mins. My overall impression is this table is built like a tank. The quality in workmanship is evident. Heavy and thick metal, strong welds, quality wheels and bearings, and well made net and table surface. The ball holders at the ends of the table are a very nice touch. The "abacus" score keepers could use a better magnet or mounting system but no big deal, don't even use them. The color of the table is really nice and gives its more professional look than the normal "green" you usually see. Overall, Im impressed with the quality of this table, its solid.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Great table... easy assembly and easy storage!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, my grandkids are over the moon with it. Great product design. It was a snap to assemble (I let the 3 of them do it... they're 15 - 16 years old). The table has a small storage footprint and folds easily... it gets put away at least once per week for a couple of days... and yes, the grandkids take care of this too. Again, great design with the clamp on net... speeds up storage. Table top is what you would expect from Joola... great... really very happy I bought this table.
customer_reviews.author: kgh1229

customer_reviews.title: Joola Fun Starting from Opening the Box!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this table for family fun with adults and grandkids. It has incredible bounce and professional play. It is sturdy and sooo... easy to assemble. We were playing in 30 minutes once we organized all the parts. You really do get exercise playing this game! The only flaw is the scoring that keeps sliding off the table but then attaches right back on. Just need to place it the right spot. We purchased the paddles and balls as well. Overall a grand slam purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MayGirl

customer_reviews.title: Happy with table not happy with service
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, sturdy and well made. They offer a first free set of balls but they never came. Three months later I asked again and the “manager” said we will send them soon. Still haven’t gotten them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table. I had a 1500 $ Stiga back ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table. I had a 1500 $ Stiga back in the day and this table is way better. Solid legs, easy assembly (did by myself), storage is very easy and is very mobile throughout the space. Table plays nice and fast super sturdy. I was hesitant buying a ping pong table online without seeing it. Not disappointed at all. The white black and red is very unique.
customer_reviews.author: jason buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the little ball holders in the four corners. We've gotten a little use out of this so far. Ball has a good bounce on the table, love the ease of putting the net on and taking it off. Very good design on that. Tables fold up easily and roll nicely on the laminate wood flooring. Product arrived with no damage and on time. We are very pleased with this table.
customer_reviews.author: denkar

customer_reviews.title: We love this table
customer_reviews.text: We love this table! It arrived very well packaged, no marks or breaks! My husband put it together in about an hour, he said it was easy, and we played it for another two, lol! The ball holders and score are a wonderful little extra with the quality and well worth the price. It has everything a family would want in a ping pong table:) We highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Professional enough for family play
customer_reviews.text: This ping pong table is for the family to use in my shop area. Large open area with plenty of room to play but I don't always want it set up taking up the room. Stores upright in a very small foot print against the wall. Out of the box was easy to assemble with just a couple of wrenches, Did have to tighten some screws on a pre-assembled support bracket that must have come loose while being shipped or just overlooked at the factory. So far the table feels very sturdy during play and the wheels lock so you don't have movement while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table.
customer_reviews.text: The table delivered as promised by a very nice delivery guy. The box is pristine, the table intact. The kids love it. It folded up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: drsuna

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to assemble and store
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for close to a year. Excellent build quality, easy to assemble, and has provided loads of fun for family and friends. Storing is easy too, just separate the halves and the two sides stand upright on wheels to roll into a closet or another room.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality/Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as requested, VERY easy to install, would have designed legs a little differently but sturdy. Took about 10 minutes to install and setup.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Colbeck

customer_reviews.title: Great table and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Wow we really love this ping pong table. Easy to assemble and seems to be a very well made high quality table. I would definitely recommend Joola if you are looking for a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernSeahawk

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review after using the table for 6 months, easy to assemble- it was a breeze and good playing surface - the feel is very good, and for the price very sturdy it was extremely easy to move the table from one room to other without . much inconvenience - the wheels work grt! since it is foldable - it does not take much room My kids are 9 and 12, they are learning the game and they are enjoying the table!! i will definitely recommend the table
customer_reviews.author: balaji desai

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Seems very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This table is going in a work environment and I wanted something that would last. It is a very well made table; great bounce and high quality net! The only bad thing I can say is when it was manufactured they forgot the small grommets on the underside of one of the tables. I will contact Joola very soon for a fix.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T.

customer_reviews.title: Ok table, mine was not leveled straight.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product , installation was very easy and quick. The reason for the low rating is after I finished to put it together it's not straight , not too bad but one side is a half inch higher .
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: It's great because it folds in half and can be rolled ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my father for Christmas. He used to be a ping pong guy in college. It's great because it folds in half and can be rolled away (my mom likes this). It's in our basement and is a great table. It's a little strange that the two halves don't connect, but it hasn't been a problem when playing.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Easy set-up. Looks very sleek and already provides a lot of fun. It was worth paying the extra $20 to have it delivered to the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sturdy table - easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble and have up and running. The box is VERY heavy and you will need 2 people. We opened the box and brought the pieces where we wanted to assemble. Can't wait to have many years of tournaments with this table.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: This item was packaged very well so there was NO damage in freight. It also shipped very quickly. As advertised it is 95% assembled and with two people it took about 15 minutes to put it together. It is a high quality table perfect for amateur play.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my Joola table. The table itself is pretty heavy which means sturdy. Assembly was pretty simple as the legs were already assembled prior to delivery. It probably took about 20-30 minutes to complete it. Once it was all set up and ready to go it was GAME time! The table is great. I have it set up inside my house on wood floors and the wheel stoppers work excellent the table does not move around at all during play. I would highly recommend this table for a nice indoor, reliable table. And it was one of the few tables I could find in a charcoal color to match the inside of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Anwar Karam

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! It was easy to assemble, easy to store, sleek looking (black top), and very smooth. I read reviews on other tables where the balls didn’t bounce as smoothly due to the material of the table; no issues with this one. This was a great addition to our house as it gets the kids off the electronics and out moving. My husband and I play this whenever we need a good break from adulting.
customer_reviews.author: serrano

customer_reviews.title: The quality of table surface is not good as
customer_reviews.text: The surface was scratched. One screw can not be tightened. The quality of table surface is not good as expected
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: The description states that the color of this table is charcoal and shows white legs. The one we received was bright blue. I purchased because of the charcoal color so now I have to return it
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table! It is quality made, came well boxed,and delivered to the room I wanted it in. It was relatively easy to put together. I'd recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mid level table.
customer_reviews.text: Table was easy to put together with clear directions. Everything needed was included. There were a few small screws that were loose and the package was damaged when we received it but nothing was missing and the table was undamaged. Table is great to play on.
customer_reviews.author: Kels from MA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice table. Quality looks good but I ran into a couple problems. The day after delivery I went to put the table together and found a broken corner. I guess you can't blame Joola unless you fault the shipping box. When I installed the ball holders I also had trouble getting the screws to grab. It was like they were too small. I haven't contacted Joola yet so maybe I'm doing something wrong. Even with the cracked corner and loose screws the ball holders still work. I wish I could give them a 5 but that wouldn't be accurate. You'll need to buy paddles and balls.
customer_reviews.author: D. T.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, had to send the first one back due to shipping damage. Replacement arrived in good shape. Easy to assemble. Folds up quickly for storage. Good surface and bounce. Solid.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Quality table!
customer_reviews.text: We've been very happy with our ping pong table! It was not too torturous to put together, and it's a really nice quality table. Happy that it has been delivering many hours of enjoyment to our family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lange

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table, but came with scratches
customer_reviews.text: This ping pong table is really nice and easy to put together out of the box. The only complaint I would have is that it arrived with scratches along the white outline of the table and also some scratches in the middle. Kind of like it has been used before. I would probably recommend buying somewhere local that you can inspect before taking it home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this table!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Joola Rally Professional Grade Table! I have it in the garage, and the ability to store the table and still park my car was a huge benefit of this product. It is a great table and I would recommend to anyone interested in buying a quality table to play recreationally. I love the addition of the ball holders on the end of the table. Assembly was quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Wallet Case Guy

customer_reviews.title: High quality, sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome! I was skeptical that it would be as easy to set up and raise/lower one side (for single play) as other reviewers mentioned, but it is! The table is also sturdy and easy to move around. The corner ball holders and magnetic scorers are very appreciated extra touches on this model. Highly recommended for any family who wants a top notch table!
customer_reviews.author: hjk

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, great table!
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy our table tennis table! It was a heavy box that thankfully someone else delivered. Moving the box around with two people can be tough if you're going up or down stairs like we did...would recommend opening the box and taking the table halves up/dow/around individually. Box came looking like it had fallen off a few trucks, but nothing inside was damaged as it was packaged really securely. Table plays great and we enjoy how easy it is to move around and store. Would recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Evans II

customer_reviews.title: Great value table for a home rec room
customer_reviews.text: Great value table for a home rec room. Really easy to set-up. It took less than 30 minutes for my two sons, under 13, to complete (with dad guidance, of course). Leveling feet on the four corners. Easy fold-up storage that rolls on good quality, metal and rubber casters. Many products in this price range have plastic casters. Excellent, on-time Amazon shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T Mangeot

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase so far! The table is of great quality, and it was fairly easy to set up. It also folds up easily when you are done using it. I would highly recommend this table! It is important to note that the delivery guys will only bring it inside the door for you and not to the location where you plan to set it up. They really only wanted to bring it into the garage and leave it there, but we did get them to bring in the front door. Not a complaint, just an important note to keep in mind when having it delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

product_meta.title: JOOLA Rally TL - Professional MDF Indoor Table Tennis Table w/ Quick Clamp Ping Pong Net & Post Set - 10 Minute Easy Assembly - Corner Ball Holders - USATT Approved - Ping Pong Table w/ Playback Mode
product_meta.description:
The JOOLA Rally TL Table Tennis Table is the perfect table for anyone looking for a fun-filled game of table tennis with some added style. This table is sure to become a centerpiece in your office or home with its unique black charcoal top, corner ball holders and magnetic abacus scorers. Each corner can hold up to 3 40mm table tennis balls and the two included magnetic abacuses attach to the side of the table. This awesome table tennis table comes 95% pre-assembled and is ready to play in just 15 minutes! A sleek frame and separable nesting halves make this table perfect for compact storage. The professional-grade MDF (medium density fiberboard) surface creates a consistent ball bounce and durability. Additionally, the 1.5 inch apron and 1.5 inch diameter sturdy steel legs are used to create a durable table that lasts for years. The table legs feature adjustable height levelers to ensure a level playing surface and 3-inch locking caster wheels for added stability. The JOOLA Rally TL Table features dual safety anti-tilting locking devices to ensure safety when the table is in both playing and storage positions. Simply fold one of the table halves and you can play solo with playback mode! The included net and post set features a simple, removable clamp post and an adjustable net tension system. The JOOLA Rally TL Table Tennis Table and Net Set are USATT approved.



Start playing like a champion with equipment developed for champions! JOOLA is a proud sponsor of USA Table Tennis.



Disclaimer: This is not a Ping Pong branded product and is not covered under any Ping Pong manufacturer’s warranty. The Ping Pong brand names and logos are the registered trademarks of Escalade Sports.
feature_bullets: 15mm MDF SURFACE TOURNAMENT QUALITY: Rally Tournament Line Table Tennis Table is a competition grade, regulation size indoor ping pong table, perfect for playing in your home, office, or recreation center. USATT Approved for exceptional playabilty.

EASY AND QUICK ASSEMBLY: Set up this top performing table tennis table in approximately 10 minutes out of the box. The tournament grade regulation size 72" ping pong net set has a convenient clamp system for quickly attaching and removing from the table.

SAFE, MOBILE, COMPACT STORAGE: The 2 halves and 3" lockable wheels and casters makes this ping pong table easy to roll and move around when not in use. Can be used as an outdoor ping pong table on a clear, sunny day. Does not include ping pong paddles.
DIMENSIONS: Play Position 108in L x 60in W x 30in H / Storage Positions: 62in H x 74in W x 30in D

JOOLA - AN OLYMPIC TABLE TENNIS BRAND TRUSTED FOR 60+ YEARS: Launched in the 1950s, JOOLA has been the proud sponsor of the biggest tournaments in the world, Including the Olympics, World Championships, and US Open. Equipment designed for all levels.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: JOOLA listens and learns from your feedback to create top of the line quality table tennis equipment for kids & adults. If you're not 100% satisfied or have product suggestions our customer service team is available to help.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
